name: Xolotl (itch)
description:
An axolotl action-platformer!

The gods needed to give light to the world. By sacrificing two of them, they created the sun, and the moon. But they didn't move. They needed one last sacrifice. And the chosen one was Xolotl.

Xolotl did not want to die. But he was chosen to be sacrificed. Instead, he ran away, and morphed into an animal, the axolotl, to hide and survive.

Jump and dash!
Jump around different platforming challenges all throughout the different places in the Aztec lands!



Swim!
Swim in water found all around the world, jump in and out of water to gain speed!



Become more powerful!
Regain your stolen godly powers, and become the most powerful version of yourself you can be!


  • Fantastic, dynamic movement, with tight controls.
  • Modern Pixel-Art, with detailed backgrounds, colorful worlds, and modern lighting.
  • Interact with sneaky snakes, loud lizards, and funny frogs.
  • Encounter henchmen, godlings, and animals that want to kill you.
  • Travel along a linear, yet open world. Everything is 'one big level', yet you'll always know where to go.
  • An amazing soundtrack worthy of an amazing world.

Home (xolotlgame.com)

Join our Discord server to chat with the developers and community!!
